channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole near bus stop, deep showing cables next to lamppost, 12th February
item.description:
A deep pot hole next to the Lamp post has got worse over a week and is showing cables that run under ground debris all over the foot path next to it and on cycle route

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 134, Lee High Road, Hither Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole road hasn’t had leaves cleared, 12th February
item.description:
The drains are blocking - there is standing water that goes to foul smelling after downpours. It is hard to cross the road as the road is full of leaves and puddles and muddy sludge. It is smelly. It is slippery and dangerous. It’s disgusting.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fingal Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 12th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stroud Green Road, Finsbury Park, Greater London

item.description:
